Detailed Description

Standard LeNet5-type architecture with the "RBF" layer on top.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

ebl::net_cscscfe::net_cscscfe ( nn_machine_cscscf &  n,
e_layer &  e,
int  thick,
int  si,
int  sj 
)

makes a new net_cscscfe module. <n> is a net-cscscf, <e> is an e-dist layer, <thick> is the number of outputs. <si>,<sj> are the initial replication factors.
